program.name: NIS Region, Georgia, International Military Education and Training (IMET), FY03

training.student_unit: 16 students: 14 were from MoD, 1 were from Ministry of Internal Affairs, 1 were from National Guars. Seminar occurred at MoD, Tbilisi.

39 students: 3 were from Lawyer Association "Justice and Liberty", 6 were from Ministry of Defense, 3 were from Ministry of Finance, 5 were from Defense and Security Committee, Parliament, 4 were from State Intelligence Department, 1 was from Border Troops State Department, 3 were from Ministry of Internal Affaris, 4 were from Security Ministry, 3 were from Ministry of Foreign Affairs, 1 were from National Security Council, 3 were from Anticorruption Bureau, 3 were from Control Department. Seminar occurred at Parliament of Georgia, Tbilisi.

Property Book MTT: 18 students: 15 were from 11th Brigade, Vaziani; 2 were from AFB #45445 UH-1H squadron Alexeevka, Tbilisi;1 were from Rapid Forces, Kojori. Training occurred at 11th Brigade, Vaziani.

Personnel MTT: 38 students, 20 were from MoD, Tbilisi; 1 was from 21st Infantry Brigade, Kutaisi; 1 was from 22nd Infantry Bridage, Akhaltsikhe; 1 was from NCO training center, Gori; 1 was from Marine Brigade, Poti; 1 was from AF HQ, Tbilisi; 7 were from 11th Brigade, Vaziani; 1 was from 16th Infantry Battalion, Sachkhere; 1 was from Special Forces Brigade, Kojori; 1 was from the Unified Military Academy, Tbilisi; 1 was from the Cadet Corput, Tbilisi; 1 was from AF base #45445 UH-1H squadron, Alexeevka, Tbilisi; 1 was from the Technical Recognizant Battalion, Tbilisi. Training occurd at the Unified Military Academy, Tbilisi.
